articles.author: Joseph Cotterill
articles.title: Xi Jinping to pay state visit to South Africa ahead of Brics gathering - Financial Times
articles.description: Tensions emerge as China pushes to expand the emerging-market bloc into more formidable G7 rival
articles.content: President Xi Jinping was set to arrive in South Africa to lead a Chinese push to expand the Brics emerging-market bloc, ahead of a gathering in Johannesburg of the leaders of dozens of developing nat… [+2997 chars]
